name: Computer Science Engineering
description: Focuses on software development, algorithms, artificial intelligence, and computing systems.

name: Information Technology
description: Deals with information systems, networking, cloud computing, and cybersecurity.

name: Electronics and Communication Engineering
description: Focuses on electronic circuits, communication systems, and embedded technologies.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Covers thermodynamics, manufacturing, robotics, and automotive engineering.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Deals with infrastructure, structural design, environmental engineering, and construction.

name: Electrical and Electronics Engineering
description: Focuses on power systems, electrical machines, renewable energy, and control systems.

name: Biotechnology
description: Includes genetic engineering, bioprocessing, biochemistry, and biomedical technology.

name: Aeronautical Engineering
description: Covers aircraft design, aerodynamics, propulsion systems, and flight dynamics.

name: Master of Business Administration
description: Develops management, leadership, marketing, and financial decision-making skills.

name: Artificial Intelligence & Data Science
description: Specializes in AI, ML, data analytics, neural networks, and deep learning solutions.
